author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Tests of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35326#issuecomment-922244279 pointed out that the GEN(+others) step of the HLT addOnTests use `Pythia8GeneratorFilter` while using multiple threads and therefore also 2 concurrent lumis by default. The generator fragment uses Tauola, so `Pythia8ConcurrentHadronizerFilter` can not be used. Following comments in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35350#issuecomment-923679715 this PR suggests to change the GEN fragments to those without Tauola so `Pythia8ConcurrentHadronizerFilter`, that supports concurrent lumis, can be used.

#### PR validation:

In a private test with #35326 the addOnTests run to completion.
title: Use non-Tauola GEN fragments in HLT addOnTest
